about.title: About Us - Mustafa Cangil Auto Trading Ltd. Northern Cyprus
about.subtitle: Mustafa Cangil Auto Trading Ltd.
about.description: As Northern Cyprus's most trusted vehicle gallery, we are proud to offer quality and reliable vehicles with 5+ years of experience in Nicosia and Kyrenia. Used car sales, vehicle financing, and 24/7 customer support.

hero.subtitle: As Northern Cyprus's most reliable vehicle gallery, we have been providing premium vehicle experience for over 5 years

about.missionText: To prioritize customer satisfaction by offering quality and reliable vehicles at reasonable prices. To produce solutions suitable for each customer's needs and to be a pioneer in the sector.
about.visionText: To be the most reliable and preferred vehicle gallery in Northern Cyprus. To be a pioneer in customer satisfaction in the sector and to show continuous development.
about.valuesText: We serve with our values of trust, quality, customer satisfaction and professionalism. We maintain our principles of transparency and honesty in every transaction.
about.experienceText: We have been operating in the sector for over 25 years. During this time, we have served thousands of customers and become a trusted name in the sector.
about.serviceAreaText: We serve throughout Northern Cyprus. We provide close service to our customers with our central office in Nicosia and our branch in Kyrenia.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us?
whyChooseUs.subtitle: We continuously improve ourselves to gain the trust of our customers

reliableService.title: Reliable Service
reliableService.description: We serve with years of experience and trust. Customer satisfaction is our priority.

qualityCars.title: Quality Vehicles
qualityCars.description: We only select quality and reliable vehicles. Every vehicle is thoroughly inspected.

expertTeam.title: Expert Team
expertTeam.description: We provide you with the best service with our expert team in the field.

wideRange.title: Wide Vehicle Range
wideRange.description: We have a wide range of vehicle options suitable for every budget.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say?
testimonials.subtitle: Read our customers' experiences and discover our reliability

testimonials.name: Ahmet Yılmaz
testimonials.text: Honestly, I'm really happy with my BMW X5! When I bought it, everything was so transparent. Mustafa's team really knows their stuff. They didn't hide anything about the car, explained every detail. I've been using it for 6 months now, no problems at all.

testimonials.name: Maria Petrou
testimonials.text: Buying a used car has always been stressful for me. But not here! The team was so patient, answered all my questions. The cars are really clean and well-maintained. My family loved it too, thank you!

testimonials.name: Mehmet Kaya
testimonials.text: I've been in the car business for 25 years, seen many galleries. But Mustafa's place is different. They value customers, approach them genuinely. They've always been by my side both when buying and selling cars. Definitely recommend!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions - Mustafa Cangil Auto Trading Ltd.
faq.description: Frequently asked questions and answers at Northern Cyprus's most trusted car dealership. Everything you need to know about car sales, financing, and test drives.
faq.keywords: FAQ, frequently asked questions, Northern Cyprus car dealership, Mustafa Cangil Auto Trading Ltd., car sales, financing, test drive, car dealership questions

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Answers to your questions about Northern Cyprus's most trusted car dealership

questions.question: Do your cars come with warranty?
questions.answer: Yes, all our cars undergo comprehensive technical inspection and are sold with 6 months warranty. We also offer 1 year engine and transmission warranty.

questions.question: Do you provide car financing?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide car financing through our bank partnerships. Contact us for interest rates and payment plans.

questions.question: Can I take a test drive?
questions.answer: Of course! You can test drive any car before purchasing. Contact us to schedule an appointment.

questions.question: Can I get information about the car's history?
questions.answer: Yes, we provide detailed history information for each car (mileage, accident history, maintenance records).

questions.question: Can I trade in my old car?
questions.answer: Yes, we can evaluate your old car and trade it in for a new car purchase. We offer free inspection service.

questions.question: How long does car delivery take?
questions.answer: For cash purchases, same day delivery. For financed purchases, 2-3 business days.

questions.question: Do you provide car insurance?
questions.answer: Yes, we work with all insurance companies to offer you the most suitable insurance options.

questions.question: Do you provide car maintenance service?
questions.answer: Yes, we have post-sale maintenance and repair services. We provide quality service with our expert technicians.
